definition: AQSIQ/PRC State Administration of Quality Supervision, Inspection and Quarantine

sentences.english: However, he opted not to take part because of quarantine problems with his horse.
sentences.chinese: 不过，他那时选择不参加，因为他的马有检疫问题。

sentences.english: We hope you can show us the certificate issued by the Health Office.
sentences.chinese: 希望你方能提供已经检疫所签发的证书。

sentences.english: Phytosanitary, which shows the characteristics of both public goods and technical rampart, is a significant part of Negotiation on Agricultural Multilateral Trade.

sentences.english: To undertake the other tasks as assigned by HeNan Entry-exit Inspection & Quarantine Bureau.

sentences.english: It is said that all ships coming from abroad should be performed quarantine.

sentences.english: We have commission bureau opcommodity inspection and quarantine( bcc) to conduct inspection.

sentences.english: This is simply a hygienic inspection issue.
sentences.chinese: 这一问题是纯粹的卫生检疫问题。

sentences.english: Your vaccination certificate is still valid.
